New Records: Adam Zampa took four wickets in a vital win for Australia
Josh Inglis hit a career-best 58 from 59 balls
Pat Cummins contributed with two wickets
Glenn Maxwell had a cameo with 31 runs from 21 balls
Key Match Events: Australia's collapse losing Warner and Smith in the same over
Sri Lanka's 9-52 collapse triggered by Zampa and Cummins
Zampa's dismissal of Kusal Mendis and Sadeera Samarawickrama
Pre-Game Insights: Australia needed the win to revive World Cup hopes
Adam Zampa played through back spasms and aimed for better performance
Post-Match Reflections: Zampa expressed pride in the win despite back spasms
Mitchell Marsh's strong start was noted
Sri Lanka's struggles after three losses
Miscellaneous Highlights: Match played in Lucknow with delays due to wind
Australia's need to boost net run rate
